item.title: Hope - Journal
item.description: This is accompanied with Hope This is to maintain a daily journal of the efforts. This is to be seen from bottom to top. To explain the jargons: cw: current weight gw: goal weight Ok, lets start. March 1, 2021 cw: 75.15 pulls: 0 We had a outing today, so I woke and completed the sets of exercise in the morning. 5.18 kms with a avg pace of 9.
